title: 株主総会に関する役員向け説明（２）

conversation.ja_sentence: 株主総会開催にあたり、全体的な流れはこちらの資料の通りになります。
conversation.en_sentence: The overall schedule for the general meeting of shareholders will be as shown on this material here.

conversation.ja_sentence: そのうち、役員の皆様が関係する項目について、ピックアップしてご説明します。
conversation.en_sentence: Among that, I will select the topics related to all the executives and explain them.

conversation.ja_sentence: まず、総会当日は、お手元にあるシナリオ通りに発言し、進めて参ります。
conversation.en_sentence: First of all, on the day of the general meeting, we will explain and proceed it according to the scenario in front of you.

conversation.ja_sentence: 本日を含め、３回、シナリオの読み合わせ及び役員の入場から退場までの一連の流れを確認します。
conversation.en_sentence: We will review overall flow from the entrance and the exit for the executives and also go over the scenario 3 times including today.

conversation.ja_sentence: すべて、能勢さんにも同席していただきますので、改善した方が良い点などはご指摘ください。
conversation.en_sentence: We will have Nose-san attend all of it so please point out things that we should improve on.

conversation.ja_sentence: 本日は、この後、この会議室を使ってリハーサルを行います。
conversation.en_sentence: Today, we will do a rehearsal using this meeting room here after this.

conversation.ja_sentence: 来週、取締役と常勤監査役のみで、社内でリハーサルを行う予定です。
conversation.en_sentence: Next week, we plan on having a rehearsal internally with only the board of directors and the full-time corporate auditor.

conversation.ja_sentence: 総会前日には、実際の会場にて、出席者全員によるリハーサルを行います。
conversation.en_sentence: On the day before the general meeting, we will do a rehearsal with everyone in attendance at the actual venue.

conversation.ja_sentence: 前日のリハーサルには、役員以外に、本日ご出席いただいている顧問弁護士の太田先生にもお越しいただきたく存じます。
conversation.en_sentence: On the rehearsal the day before, we will also have Ota-san who is the general counsel and is in attendance today to come as well.

conversation.ja_sentence: はい、予定は空けていますよ。
conversation.en_sentence: Yes, I will keep my schedule open.

conversation.ja_sentence: また、総会当日のみ、担当監査法人の会計士の先生にも裏方に待機していただき、何かあった時のサポートをお願いしております。
conversation.en_sentence: We will also have an accountant who is our auditor on stand-by in the back only for the day of the general meeting and I have asked him to provide support when needed.

conversation.ja_sentence: 議事に関しては、お手元のシナリオ通りに発言して頂ければ問題ありません。
conversation.en_sentence: In regards to the proceedings, it will be fine if you say what is on the script on hand.

conversation.ja_sentence: しかし、質疑応答は必ずしも想定通りにはいかないと思われます。
conversation.en_sentence: But, things may not go as planned for the questions and answers.

conversation.ja_sentence: 同じくお手元にある、想定問題集は私の方で予想される問答を作成したものです。
conversation.en_sentence: I have made a list of questions which I anticipate will be asked and have answers for it in the same material in front of you.

conversation.ja_sentence: 概ね、今期のことで株主さんから突っ込まれそうな事項は網羅していると思います。
conversation.en_sentence: I think it generally covers the topics that the shareholders will most likely ask for this quarter.

conversation.ja_sentence: 相当な数なので、各取締役においてはご自分の管轄分をマスターして頂ければよろしいかと思います。
conversation.en_sentence: There is quite a bit so I'd like to ask each of the directors to master their own parts.

conversation.ja_sentence: なお、株主さんより、細かい数字についての指摘がある可能性があります。
conversation.en_sentence: There is also a possibility of being asked specific figures by the shareholders.

conversation.ja_sentence: その場合は、私を含め事務方が皆様の後ろに控え、サポートしますのでご安心下さい。
conversation.en_sentence: In that case, we will have a team of admins including myself in the back to support you so please don't worry.

conversation.ja_sentence: 基本的に株主さんからの質問については、議長である私が回答すべきと思っているよ。
conversation.en_sentence: I think I should generally be answering the questions from the shareholders as I am the chairman.

conversation.ja_sentence: でも、株主さんから、特定の取締役を指名して回答要求された場合はどうすればいい？
conversation.en_sentence: But what should we do if the shareholders would like the questions answered by a specific director?

conversation.ja_sentence: もちろん、指名された取締役がある程度説明する方が誠意は伝わります。
conversation.en_sentence: I think it will be more sincere if the specified director can explain it to an extent of course.

conversation.ja_sentence: しかし、議長が直接答えた方がよい、と判断できる場合は、議長で止めてしまっても構いません。
conversation.en_sentence: But if you can judge that the chairman should answer directly, you can stop them.

conversation.ja_sentence: その場次第です。
conversation.en_sentence: It will depend on the situation.

conversation.ja_sentence: 一旦、指名された取締役が回答して、その後に議長から補足する方法もよろしいかと。
conversation.en_sentence: I think another idea would be to have the specified director answer first then the chairman can provide a follow-up after.

conversation.ja_sentence: わかりました、その方向でいこう。
conversation.en_sentence: Okay, let's go with that.

conversation.ja_sentence: それでは、実際に一度通しでリハーサルしてみたいと思います。
conversation.en_sentence: Okay, I'd like to actually do a rehearsal and go through the whole thing.

conversation.ja_sentence: シナリオ通り進めていただいて、質疑応答も行います。
conversation.en_sentence: We will go according to the scenario and also do questions and answers.

conversation.ja_sentence: 私と能勢さんが株主役となって、質問をします。
conversation.en_sentence: Nose-san and I will be the shareholders and will ask questions.

conversation.ja_sentence: 必ずしも想定問答集通りに質問する訳ではありませんので、ご了承ください。
conversation.en_sentence: Please note that the questions may not be exactly what is on the anticipated questions list.

conversation.ja_sentence: 君らが株主役だと、本番以上に辛辣な質問を浴びることになりそうだね。
conversation.en_sentence: If you guys are the shareholders, I think we will be showered with tougher questions than the real thing.

conversation.ja_sentence: その方が、緊張感があってよろしいでしょう？
conversation.en_sentence: It will feel more tense in a good way, right?

conversation.ja_sentence: お手柔らかに頼むよ。
conversation.en_sentence: Please go easy on us.

conversation.ja_sentence: ふふ、それでは特訓になりませんよ？
conversation.en_sentence: Well, that won't be good practice!

conversation.ja_sentence: では皆様、会議室のドアを本番会場の入り口と思って、入場からスタートしてください。
conversation.en_sentence: Alright, let's pretend the door of the meeting room is the entrance of the venue on the day and start from there.

conversation.ja_sentence: それでは、始めたいと思いますので、よろしくお願いします。
conversation.en_sentence: Okay, I'd like to start now so let's go.
